attributes.action: Keep the driving age for young people at 17
attributes.additional_details: Keep the driving age exactly how it is. Raising the age to 18 is only going to make the death toll age higher to 18. If you want to lower death tolls make insurance cheaper, stop tarnishing all us 17 year olds with the same brush! some of us only have a little bit of freedom and that's learning to drive!
